Map description                        
==================
This map is **complete**. It contains ambient and door sounds, highly customized bot navigation, radar, HDR lighting, area names, cubemaps and dynamic NPC and prop shadows. This map has been updated and is now designed for **32 PLAYERS**.

**BombsiteA** contains highly-valuable crates of nuclear weapons which are to be delivered to the US military base tonight

**BombsiteB** contains remenants of radioactive waste, however this is located above the cities main sewerage system. If the radioactive waste is leaked into the system, the coastline will become contaminated

_Designer Note: The map encourages the use of smoke grenades and flanking_

Your thoughts on the map? chuck them below. _Rate, comment and enjoy!_ cheers and have a good day.
